name: Soupremacy
description:
Welcome to the Souper Bowl. Your name is Campy, and all you want is to whisk away the championship without being beaten into a tomato pulp. 

Battle against three opponents with unique attacks and pro pho-ighting skills. but don't be stewpid or you'll be souper dissoupointed.  Don't broth-er with playing nice, either. You're here to win. You're here to dominate. You're here to reign soupreme.

Made in two days for Paint Jam 2021, for the theme "Campbell's Soup", with the caveat that all art assets had to be made in MS Paint. 

Meet the team:

  • Natasha Badami, Programming @nbadami
  • Musa Haydar, Audio @musahaydar
  • Dilan Huang, Art 
  • Kushal Pithia, Art @PirateMan
  • Kaavya Ramachandhran, Art/Programming @kapitha
  • Naveen Sabharwal, Art/Programming @navelsaber
  • Andrew Zhou, Game Design @Kiptoke
